actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require authorization by law of certain consolidations of functions within the Department of Defense.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of Defense from transferring or consolidating a function, power, or duty of a military department on either a permanent or trial basis unless specifically authorized by law. Exempts transfers involving the reallocation of fewer than 200 personnel or $10,000,000 in any fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require authorization by law of certain consolidations of functions within the Department of Defense.
